name: places/ChIJb2_jb6ZYwokRfgsYQbHtZVU
formattedAddress: 175 E 96th St, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 175 E 96th St, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text:
Fiance has lived in the building for just over a year and for almost 6 months there has been ongoing construction 8:30am-5pm Mon-Friday.  On most days the noise is so loud in a given unit due to demolition your apartment becomes unlivable.  As the prior post indicated the leasing staff did an amazing job welcoming us into the building but management shows 0 concern for their residents once you have signed the lease.  My fiance works nonstandard hours and is also managing major health issues at this time, and she has not had a quiet day in her apartment for months.  We have been informing management of this since November not only can they not give an estimate upon on when the noise might cease but assume no responsibility.  I've lived in NYC my entire life and any other building that markets itself as luxury living would find a way to compensate their residents.  The only option the building has given us is to move.

If you enjoy hearing nonstop drilling, hammer and buzzsaws look no further.

Unfortunately management's ability to care for their residence overshadows how great the doorman and concierge who always go out of their way and are extremely welcoming.

originalText.text: Nice building. However managed by absolutely scum. Look elsewhere and save yourself the frustration of dealing with them.

text.text: Nice building. However managed by absolutely scum. Look elsewhere and save yourself the frustration of dealing with them.

originalText.text: BEWARE of this NYC apartment management! They lure you in quickly, but once you're locked into the lease, they completely disregard your well-being and concerns. I've been living here for a few months, and despite repeated emails pleading for action regarding my neighbors' constant cigarette smoking (which violates our lease agreement and jeopardizes my health), they have chosen to ignore me completely. It's evident that their promises of a comfortable living environment are empty and their lack of care is beyond disappointing. Stay away from this place if you value your health and expect any level of responsiveness from management. #ApartmentLivingNightmare #HealthIgnored #ZeroAccountability

originalText.text: Horrible building. Loud drilling noises 24/7 that were not mentioned when we signed the lease.

text.text: Horrible building. Loud drilling noises 24/7 that were not mentioned when we signed the lease.

originalText.text:
Relatively pricy. .Sometimes packages not delivered consistently. Residents have to do their logistics.   Expensive laundry.   All cost in, you could get better place somewhere else.

Should mention the Sun Terrance on top roof very nice though. Kids love it.

Quite convenient to grocery , playground , Starbucks (all just around the corner ) so I’d upgrade it to 4.
